name: IGSOA_Volume1_Chapter10_FullEngine
intent: Unify δ–Φ–Π–μ–χ–λ–ψ–Σ–ρ–Ω into the full IGSOA computational engine.

domain.fundamental_equation: dX/dχ = Σ[ δ(X) + Φδ(X) + ΠΦδ(X) + μ(X)δ(X) + λ(X) + ψ(X) + ρ(X) ]

constraints.global_consistency: Ω acts as invariant constraint on all dynamics
constraints.metric_integrity: μ must remain positive and valid

cross_links.volume2: Extends operator packs and formal mathematics
cross_links.volume3: Applies full engine to matter, fields, galaxies
